data.name: Adhesion Trap Hole
data.desc: When your opponent Summons a monster(s): Halve that monster(s)'s original ATK.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack
Speed Duel Starter Decks: Ultimate Predators

data.name: Aitsu
data.desc: He seems to be very unreliable, but he might have incredible potential.

data.name: Amazoness Blowpiper
data.desc: Select 1 face-up monster your opponent controls during each of your Standby Phases. It loses 500 ATK until the end of this turn.

data.name: Amazoness Paladin
data.desc: This card gains 100 ATK for each "Amazoness" monster you control.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Amazoness Spellcaster
data.desc: Target 1 "Amazoness" monster you control and 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; switch the original ATK of those targets until the end of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Anti-Spell
data.desc: Remove 2 Spell Counters on your side of the field to negate the activation of a Spell Card and destroy it.

data.name: Autonomous Action Unit
data.desc: Pay 1500 Life Points, then target 1 monster in your opponent's Graveyard; Special Summon that target to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position, and equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy the equipped monster.

card_sets.set_name: Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants
Battle Pack 2: War of the Giants

data.name: Burning Beast
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Freezing Beast" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 face-up Spell or Trap Card on the field. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Dark Cat with White Tail
data.desc: FLIP: Return 2 Monster Cards on your opponent's side of the field and 1 Monster Card on your side of the field to their owners' hands.

data.name: Dark Scorpion - Cliff the Trap Remover
data.desc:
When this card inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, you can activate 1 of these effects:
● Target 1 Spell/Trap Card on the field; destroy that target.
● Send the top 2 cards of their Deck to the Graveyard.

data.name: Decayed Commander
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Zombie Tiger" from your hand. If this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent by a direct attack: Discard 1 random card from their hand.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls

data.name: Des Dendle
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Vampiric Orchis" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster destroys 1 of your opponent's monsters, Special Summon 1 "Wicked Plant Token" (Plant-Type/EARTH/Level 1/ATK 800/DEF 800). (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Disarmament
data.desc: Destroy all Equip Cards on the field.

data.name: Emblem of Dragon Destroyer
data.desc: Add 1 "Buster Blader" from your Deck or Graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Exhausting Spell
data.desc: Remove all Spell Counters on both sides of the field.

data.name: Formation Union
data.desc:
Select and activate 1 of the following effects:
● Equip 1 Union Monster on your side of the field to an appropriate monster on your side of the field as an Equip Spell Card.
● Unequip 1 of your equipped Union Monsters and Special Summon it to your side of the field in face-up Attack Position.

data.name: Freezing Beast
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Burning Beast" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, each time the equipped monster inflicts Battle Damage to your opponent, destroy 1 face-down Spell or Trap Card on the field. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Frontline Base
data.desc: Once per turn: You can Special Summon 1 Level 4 or lower Union monster from your hand.

data.name: Gather Your Mind
data.desc: Add 1 "Gather Your Mind" card from your Deck to your hand. Your Deck is then shuffled. You can only use 1 "Gather Your Mind" per turn.

data.name: Giant Orc
data.desc: If this card attacks, it is changed to Defense Position at the end of the Battle Phase. You cannot change this battle position until the end of your next turn.

data.name: Great Angus
data.desc: A very violent beast, it is always berserk. People say that they have never seen it silent.

data.name: Hidden Spellbook
data.desc: During your turn: Target 2 Spell Cards in your Graveyard; shuffle those targets into the Deck.

data.name: Huge Revolution
data.desc: This card can only be activated during your Main Phase when "People Running About", "Oppressed People", and "United Resistance" are face-up on your side of the field. Send all cards in your opponent's hand to the Graveyard and destroy all cards your opponent controls on the field.

data.name: Jar Robber
data.desc: You can only activate this card when "Pot of Greed" is activated. Negate the effect of the "Pot of Greed" and draw 1 card from your Deck.

data.name: Kaiser Colosseum
data.desc: If there is 1 or more monster(s) on the field of the controller of this card, his/her opponent cannot place a monster on the field if his/her number of monsters would exceed the number of monsters that are on the field of this card's controller. The cards that are already on the field before this card's activation are unaffected by this effect.

data.name: Kiryu
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Dark Blade" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 900 points, and you can Tribute this card to allow the equipped monster to attack your opponent's Life Points directly this turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Kishido Spirit
data.desc: Monsters on your side of the field cannot be destroyed in a battle if the monsters' ATK are equal.

data.name: Magical Marionette
data.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell Card resolves. This card gains 200 ATK for each Spell Counter on it. You can remove 2 Spell Counters from this card, then target 1 monster on the field; destroy that target.

data.name: Magical Merchant
data.desc: FLIP: Excavate cards from the top of your Deck until you excavate a Spell/Trap, then add that card to your hand, also send the remaining cards to the GY.

data.name: Magical Plant Mandragola
data.desc: FLIP: Place 1 Spell Counter on each face-up card on the field that you can place a Spell Counter on.

data.name: Magical Scientist
data.desc: Pay 1000 Life Points to Special Summon 1 level 6 or lower Fusion Monster from your Extra Deck in face-up Attack or Defense Position. That Fusion Monster cannot attack your opponent's Life Points directly, and is returned to your Extra Deck at the end of the turn.

data.name: Mass Driver
data.desc: Tribute 1 monster on your side of the field to inflict 400 points of damage to your opponent's Life Points.

data.name: Metalsilver Armor
data.desc: As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot use the effect of a Spell, Trap, or Effect Monster that targets 1 monster, except the equipped monster.

data.name: Meteorain
data.desc: During this turn, when your monsters attack with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of your opponent's Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points.

data.name: Miracle Restoring
data.desc: Remove 2 Spell Counters from your side of the field, then target 1 "Dark Magician" or "Buster Blader" in your Graveyard; Special Summon that target.

data.name: My Body as a Shield
data.desc: When your opponent activates a Spell/Trap Card or monster effect that would destroy a monster(s) on the field: Pay 1500 LP; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 3: Yugi's World Mega Pack
Premium Gold: Return of the Bling

data.name: Neko Mane King
data.desc: During your opponent's turn, when this card in your possession is sent to your Graveyard by an opponent's card effect: It becomes the End Phase of this turn.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Old Vindictive Magician
data.desc: FLIP: Target 1 monster your opponent controls; destroy that target.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel Starter Decks: Match of the Millennium

data.name: Oppressed People
data.desc: They are oppressed, but believe they will have their freedom someday.

data.name: People Running About
data.desc: Although they always suffer in silence, they swear an oath to inevitably revolt.

data.name: Physical Double
data.desc: During your opponent's turn: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls; Special Summon 1 "Mirage Token" with the same Level, Type, Attribute, ATK, and DEF as that target. Destroy this Token during the End Phase.

data.name: Pineapple Blast
data.desc: When you Normal Summon a monster, if your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Destroy your opponent's monsters so that your opponent controls the same number of monsters as you (your opponent chooses which of their monsters are destroyed).

data.name: Pitch-Dark Dragon
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this card on the field, you can equip it to your "Dark Blade" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, increase the ATK/DEF of the equipped monster by 400 points. When it attacks with an ATK that is higher than the DEF of a Defense Position monster, inflict the difference as Battle Damage to your opponent's Life Points. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Pixie Knight
data.desc: When this card is sent to the Graveyard as a result of battle, your opponent selects 1 Spell Card from your Graveyard, and places that card on the top of your Deck.

data.name: Poison of the Old Man

card_sets.set_name: Starter Deck: Dawn of the Xyz

data.name: Raregold Armor
data.desc: As long as you control the monster equipped with this card, your opponent cannot attack other monsters other than the equipped monster.

data.name: Remove Brainwashing
data.desc: The control of all monsters on the field returns to the owners.

data.name: Rivalry of Warlords
data.desc: Each player can only control 1 Type of monster. Send all other face-up monsters they control to the GY.

data.name: Roulette Barrel
data.desc: Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die twice, choose 1 result, and destroy 1 monster on the field whose Level is equal to that result.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 4: Joey's World Mega Pack

data.name: Royal Magical Library
data.desc: Each time a Spell Card is activated, place 1 Spell Counter on this card when that Spell resolves (max. 3). You can remove 3 Spell Counters from this card; draw 1 card.

data.name: Second Goblin
data.desc: Once per turn, during your Main Phase, if you control this monster on the field, you can equip it to your "Giant Orc" as an Equip Spell Card, OR unequip the Union equipment and Special Summon this card in face-up Attack Position. While equipped to a monster by this card's effect, you can change the equipped monster's battle position once per turn. (1 monster can only be equipped with 1 Union Monster at a time. If the equipped monster is destroyed as a result of battle, destroy this card instead.)

data.name: Senri Eye
data.desc: Once per turn, during each of your Standby Phases, you can pay 100 Life Points to look at 1 card on the top of your opponent's Deck and return it to its original position. Your opponent cannot look at the card.

data.name: Sonic Duck
data.desc: A duck which can walk at a sonic speed. Sometimes, he cannot deal with his incredible pace and loses control.

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Attack from the Deep
Structure Deck: Lord of the Storm

data.name: The Spell Absorbing Life
data.desc: Flip all face-down Defense Position Monster Cards on the field face-up. Flip Effects are not activated at this time. Increase your Life Points by 400 points for each Effect Monster Card on the field.

data.name: Thunder of Ruler
data.desc: During your opponent's Standby Phase: You can activate this card; there is no Battle Phase this turn.

data.name: Union Rider
data.desc: You can take control of up to 1 Union Monster that is currently a monster on your opponent's side of the field, and equip it to this card. The Union Monster that is equipped to this card cannot be changed back to a monster using its own effect.

data.name: United Resistance
data.desc: The people that gather to swear to fight their oppressors. A revolution is coming.

data.name: Vampiric Orchis
data.desc: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Des Dendle" from your hand.

data.name: Wave-Motion Cannon
data.desc: During your Main Phase: You can send this face-up card to the GY; inflict 1000 damage to your opponent for each of your Standby Phases that have passed since this card was activated.

data.name: White Dragon Ritual
data.desc: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Paladin of White Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 4 or more.

data.name: Zombie Tiger
data.desc: Once per turn, you can either: Target 1 "Decayed Commander" you control; equip this card to that target, OR: Unequip this card and Special Summon it in Attack Position. While equipped by this effect, the equipped monster gains 500 ATK/DEF. If the equipped monster destroys an opponent's monster by battle: Discard 1 random card from their hand. (A monster can only be equipped with 1 Union monster at a time. If the equipped monster would be destroyed by battle, destroy this card instead.)

card_sets.set_name: Speed Duel: Arena of Lost Souls
